per_frame_init_1=state = 0;
per_frame_1=bass_clip = above(bass_att,bass_clip)*2 + (1-above(bass_att,bass_clip))*((bass_clip-1.3)*0.96+1.3);
per_frame_2=basstime = basstime + (bass_att*0.03);
per_frame_3=
per_frame_4=
per_frame_5=time2 = time2 + (bass_att*0.09);
per_frame_6=
per_frame_7=//punlish
per_frame_8=q1 = state;
per_frame_9=q2 = basstime;
per_frame_10=q3 = bass_clip;
per_frame_11=q4 = time2;
per_frame_12=
per_frame_13=ob_r = ob_r + 0.5*sin(time*1.22);
per_frame_14=ob_g = ob_g + 0.5*sin(time*1.307);
per_frame_15=ob_b = ob_b + 0.5*sin(time*1.959);
per_frame_16=
per_frame_17=
per_frame_18=monitor = bass_clip;
per_pixel_1=//use simple fuzzy logic to model zooming
per_pixel_2=
per_pixel_3=//rules
per_pixel_4=fuzzy1 = x*0.1*rad;
per_pixel_5=fuzzy3 = (x-1)*0.1*rad;
per_pixel_6=fuzzy2 = y*0.1*rad;
per_pixel_7=fuzzy4 = (y-1)*0.1*rad;
per_pixel_8=
per_pixel_9=//activations approx sawtooth with sin curve
per_pixel_10=f1 = sin(q4 - 1.5707);
per_pixel_11=f2 = sin(q4);
per_pixel_12=f3 = sin(q4 + 1.5707);
per_pixel_13=f4 = sin(q4 + 3.14);
per_pixel_14=
per_pixel_15=//take only values above zero
per_pixel_16=f1 = f1*above(f1,0);
per_pixel_17=f2 = f2*above(f2,0);
per_pixel_18=f3 = f3*above(f3,0);
per_pixel_19=f4 = f4*above(f4,0);
per_pixel_20=
per_pixel_21=//sum rule ativations
per_pixel_22=sum_fuzzy = fuzzy1*f1 + fuzzy2*f2 - fuzzy3*f3 - fuzzy4*f4;
per_pixel_23=
per_pixel_24=zoom = 0.975 - (rad- 0.5)*0.05 + sum_fuzzy*0.5;
